response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and enhance your business operations significantly. Given its unique features and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that's mutually beneficial. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the value of the product itself but also the expertise and support we provide to ensure its successful integration into your operations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or negotiate the terms.", "product_price": 15000}
